overall_assessment.summary: This lesson poses significant challenges for Jordan. Major revisions needed to ensure accessibility.
overall_assessment.primary_concern: Lesson framed as test prep with no real-world relevance explanation

strengths.why_helpful: Jordan can exercise autonomy and approach work in preferred way

strengths.observation: Lesson includes opportunities for student autonomy
strengths.why_helpful: Jordan can exercise agency over learning process

concerns.issue: Lesson framed as test prep with no real-world relevance explanation
concerns.impact: Jordan will disengage immediately from work perceived as pointless drill
concerns.evidence: Objective: 'Students will memorize the steps of photosynthesis' - no relevance to student life/future

recommendation.change: Reframe objective around authentic purpose and add "why this matters" context
recommendation.rationale: Unmotivated capable students need to see purpose before they invest effort
recommendation.implementation: Begin lesson with compelling hook showing real-world application of skill

concerns.issue: All activities are retrieval/comprehension level - no higher-order thinking required
concerns.impact: Jordan will find this intellectually boring and disengage; capable of much more

recommendation.change: Add analysis or knowledge utilization tasks that challenge capable students
recommendation.rationale: Above-grade-level students need cognitive challenge to stay engaged
recommendation.implementation: Replace at least one drill activity with analysis, evaluation, or creation task

concerns.issue: Pure academic exercise with no connection to authentic contexts
concerns.impact: Jordan sees no point in work disconnected from reality; effort will be minimal
concerns.evidence: Activities focus on abstract practice without application context

recommendation.change: Frame activities within authentic scenario or real-world problem
recommendation.rationale: Capable students engage when they see skills used in actual contexts
